articles.title: Equities extend rally on rate hopes, traders await OPEC decision - RFI English
articles.description: Asian investors joined their Wall Street and European counterparts in an equity buying spree Wednesday as more data pointing to weakness in the US economy further fanned hopes the Federal Reserve could temper its rate hike campaign.

articles.author: Ellie Kaufman, Oren Liebermann
articles.title: US Navy's latest and most advanced aircraft carrier deploys for first time - CNN
articles.description: The US Navy's newest and most advanced aircraft carrier left on its first deployment Tuesday from Norfolk, Virginia, designed to put the ship through its paces and exercise with allies in North America and Europe.

articles.title: Worlds 2022 Play-in Qualifier 1: NA>EU Roars Evil Geniuses at MAD Lions - AFK Gaming
articles.description: Evil Geniuses rewrote LoL Esports history by winning against a European team in a BO5 series at Worlds 2022. It won against MAD Lions with a 3-0 scoreline.
articles.content: There was action on the lower half of the map initiated by both EG and MAD Lions but the first blood fell only at 8.40 minutes as MAD Lions collapsed on Joseph Joon "jojopyun" Pyun. But EG secured th… [+745 chars]

articles.title: EU moves ahead with plans to standardize phone chargers by 2024 - CBC News
articles.description: The European Parliament approved new rules on Tuesday that will introduce a single charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras in the EU by 2024, a world first that is expected to affect iPhone maker Apple more than its rivals.
